description: Integrate streaming progress feedback into the web UI for visual progress indication during proposal generation
steps: Open the web application and start a chat session
Complete the requirements gathering phase
Click 'Generate Proposal' button
Verify a visual progress indicator shows current agent (BOM, Pricing, Proposal)
Verify each agent step updates the UI in real-time via SSE events
Verify completion displays the final proposal

description: Add web interface endpoint to retrieve previous proposals
steps: Complete a full proposal generation workflow
Access the '/api/proposals' endpoint (or equivalent)
Verify the previous proposal is returned
Start a new session and generate another proposal
Verify both proposals are retrievable

description: Add proposal storage mechanism to persist generated proposals
steps: Generate a proposal through the web or CLI interface
Verify proposal is stored in session or persistent storage
Retrieve the stored proposal via API
Verify proposal content matches the generated output

description: Include links to Azure pricing pages in the proposal for transparency

Verify each service in the Cost Breakdown section has a pricing link
Click on a pricing link and verify it navigates to the correct Azure pricing page

description: Add OpenTelemetry metrics counters for proposal generations
steps: Define a counter metric for proposals_generated_total

description: Add OpenTelemetry metrics counters for errors

description: Enhance logs with structured data using extra={} parameter for better querying
